Some explaining in English:

We have a genre in this country called "sexrock" but it doesn't say much about the sound, more about the lyrics. Which doesn't always have to be about sex, but is usually quite pervert but above all very provocative and disrespectful. Sometimes just intentionally stupid. But one important thing here is that its very unserious even if i, and others who have made this kind of music, are trying to make a point in some of the tracks. This was foremost a 90's thing to my knowledge, but this one is new. Examples of bands are Onkel Konkel, Snorleifs, Binnikebengt Och Roj RÃƒÂ¶vmuns Orkester etc. I've made everything myself, inkl mixing and mastering. The sound quality isn't the best, i know:) The reason i explain in English here is because some of the tracks are in English. It varies alot in genre, soundwise. It focuses mostely on rock, punk, techno, ebm and synth i guess.

I've made more music in the same bandname:Same idiotic sense of humour mixed with some anger but quite different style. Some sort of sick and twisted grindcore/death metal. I've tried using the must insane and stupid bandname possible. If i have succeeded, is a matter of opinion i guess, haha
